prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a blue body and unique tentacle-like features.
Design a bug-type creature that excels in aquatic environments with vibrant green accents.
Imagine a Pokemon with an insectoid shape and a transparent, bubble-like structure around its body.
Generate a medium-sized Pokemon that thrives in wetlands and has striking yellow and blue colors.
Show me a Pokemon that combines both water and bug types with interesting web-like traits.
Make a Pokemon that looks friendly and agile, with a glossy surface and large eyes.
Give me a creature that showcases a blend of aquatic and insect characteristics, perfect for exploration.
